title: Fix Zyra Please

That being said, their range ~~is~~ seemed abysmally small and since they only spawn for 8 seconds or two auto attacks it's hard to even see what their range is without digging into champion data.

Her Plants are bugged.  In about 30% of her games the plants will not attack anything unless directed by a spell or auto attack even when they are right next to a valid target.

They are still bugged. They do still attack some to most of the time, but not like they should. I do agree with everything else you said.

Their range differs depending on whether they are Q or E plants. Q plants are 575 Range (350 self aggro range). E plants only have a 400/350 range.

If used correctly, Q plants have an effective range of 1375 from Zyra's origin.

Hardly "Dismally small."

I can 1v2 top lane with Zyra with this "dismally small" range.

I get it, you had access to information that I didn't have. Cool.

Thanks for the info.

I run her as support which is a whole other animal and their range hasn't been my primary concern.

Information you don't have access to? 

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Zyra

And...... I play her as support too. It's really not. If anything, Zyra has a slightly easier time in support, because range champs can't 1 shot plants.

If you're having trouble getting Zyra's plants to attack, realize Zyra herself has a 575 attack range. If you miss a champion with a skill but proc plants..... auto attack the champion. The plants will follow suit. There are only a couple adcs who outrange Zyra's auto attacks.
